name: Godface
description:
For the Mage and the Sorcerer - the realm of the dead holds an eternal struggle – a contest of dexterity and might – in honour of The Godface – only to end at the beginning – ad infinitum.

________________________________

Press F to toggle fullscreen.

Draw symbols with the mouse. Combinations of symbols form spells that heal you or damage your opponent. Take turns with the mouse to attempt a spell. Cast wisely.
